title: snowdown shop not working
body: i got a discount on Challenger ahri and everytime i try to buy it says i cant and i have have rp for it to but its says there a problem whats going on?

replies.body: Same for me bro you got anything new ?
I have the same problem, also with the challenger ahri skin and have sent a ticket to Riot. Hope it can be resolved soon!

Hey morekaks,

At this time, you're advised to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so that they can assist you further. You can do that on the Riot Games Support website at: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
